channel.title: Problem With Portfowarding.. Can't be too hard this problem.[plzread]
channel.description:
Hey umm i have a problem with portforwarding atm, A long time ago i had a problem with portforwarding on my belkin router but that one was glitched and always restarted itself every like 5 mins so yes with that one i did solve my portforwarding problem and ppl were able to play with my ip just they'd dc every 5 mins. so a few days ago i bought a new router my internet works 100% perfect, and i decided i wanted to give it a shot at making a private server again, i remember how to code still, its just my problem is i'll use a server status checker and it says my server is offline but really its online.. And i have a WLAN BroadBand Router.
Here's a screenie of the port forwarding section for my router... [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/mo7dd.jpg[/img]
please help as soon as possible thx.

item.title: Problem With Portfowarding.. Can't be too hard this problem.[plzread]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Skillapwnz:

what you mean… i put the ip in the status page my no-ip. and my client isn’t connecting to a ip because that’s how i use it i log on with local host i did that with my last server/router aswell but the client i put for download has my no-ip in it.

I dont really know what you just said. but you might have to contact and admin about this.

Read full topic

the status checker on status page, for example I used the runelocus status page checker and also on runelocus status page it says my server is offline. same with the status checker. and i was gonna put my server on mopar scape status page till i found out it doesen’t even show its online.
